name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: High-quality wireless Bluetooth headphones with noise cancellation and 20-hour battery life.

review_5001.comment: Amazing sound quality and battery life!

review_5002.comment: Comfortable to wear, but a bit pricey.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Eco-friendly stainless steel water bottle with a 1-liter capacity and vacuum insulation.

review_5003.comment: Keeps my drinks cold all day. Highly recommend!

name: Smart LED Light Bulb
description: Smart LED light bulb with adjustable brightness and color settings, compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant.

review_5005.comment: Great features, but had some issues with the initial setup.

review_5006.comment: Works perfectly with my smart home system.
